de-DE:
The following replacements can be used in the text: \n\n%(* %|fields|%\n)s

It's also possible to add **:urlencoded** to the key in order to encode the value.

<<<<<<< HEAD
For localization fields use **:best** to use the best frontend language, otherwise all values will be appended.
en-US:
The following replacements can be used in the text: \n\n%(* %|fields|%\n)s

It's also possible to add **:urlencoded** to the key in order to encode the value.

For localization fields use **:best** to use the best frontend language, otherwise all values will be appended.

de-DE: In order to use replacements it's necessary to select fields above.
en-US: In order to use replacements it's necessary to select fields above.

key: For localization fields use **:best** to use the best frontend language
de-DE: otherwise all values will be appended.

The following replacements can be used in the text: \n\n%(* %|fields|%\n)s

It's also possible to add **:urlencoded** to the key in order to encode the value.

For localization fields use **:best** to use the best frontend language, otherwise all values will be appended.
The output will use markdown.
